explains: n. （尤指对别人的意见）不宽容；偏狭

sentences.en: Intolerance does not stem from disagreement.
Intolerance should not be confused with disagreement.
sentences.cn: 不宽容不应与分歧相混淆。

sentences.en: None of these reasons is an excuse for allowing the intolerance to continue.
sentences.cn: 这些理由都不能成为允许这种偏狭继续下去的借口。
